basic.description: This course is a hands-on introduction to environmental and hydraulic engineering topics. Physical experiments that demonstrate fundamental concepts such as hydrostatics, pipe flow, open channel flow, water quality, and water treatment processes are performed.
basic.subject: CWR
basic.title: Environmental and Hydraulic Engineering Laboratory

extra.enrollment_requirement: Pre- or Corequisite: EES 3040 or CWR 3201.
